data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Puissant, Stéphane, Lee, Young June (2016): Description of a new species of the genus Hyalessa China (Hemiptera: Cicadidae: Sonatini) from Yunnan, China, with a key to the species of Hyalessa and a calling song analysis for two Hyalessa species. Zootaxa 4114 (4): 434-446, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4114.4.4
